channel.title: Serve-Scape v1
channel.description:
Yes I know its called Server-Scape thats what my old Server was called lol Ok as myfirst realease i though what base should i use and i was like why not WL just because its WL and most servers are WL so i choose this :]
Features: Accounts made to show how to make Mod, Admin, Owner and stuff also they will have there rights by there names :] to add rights go to IOClient.java and look up Mod and there you are it says it all
Thread Per Client is now in :] no laghandler or antilag it makes lag :P all features of the blank winterlove source Z O D I A C's realeased list
Credits: Jmood128 (for adding Thread Per Client) Graham (Thread Per Client Tut) Z O D I A C (for the source hes not owner!) Mrs Extro Limited (i think the creator?) i am not sure on this
If I a missing some one sorry ill add though
What V2 could have!: Shops fixed Mini Games Event Manager stuff lol Teleports Economy Bug Fix Might fix loading and save so it loads the .txt files and not .Dat! other things :]
EDIT: sorry forgot to add DL Link: DL Link: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jdywkyyyykz

Yes I know its called Server-Scape thats what my old Server was called lol
Ok as myfirst realease i though what base should i use and i was like why not WL just because its WL and most servers are WL so i choose this :]

Features:
Accounts made to show how to make Mod, Admin, Owner and stuff
also they will have there rights by there names :] to add rights go to IOClient.java and look up Mod and there you are it says it all

no laghandler or antilag it makes lag
